'Requirements analysis' in systems engineering and software engineering,
encompasses those tasks that go into determining the needs or conditions to meet
for a new or altered product, taking account of the possibly conflicting
requirements of the various stakeholders, 'analyzing, documenting, validating
and managing' software or system requirements. Kotonya, G. and Sommerville,
I. 1998. Requirements Engineering: Processes and Techniques Chichester, UK: John
Wiley and Sons.
